content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the taurage district court the court made a final decision on the division of property in a divorce case the applicant was given a vehicle and personal property while the court declared the apartment as community property and awarded the defendant half of it the text discusses various articles of the civil code related to matrimonial property the applicant filed a court application seeking the dissolution of their marriage recognition of a car and an apartment as personal property compensation for their share of the property and maintenance the parties disagreed on the value of the apartment and the car and the defendant was accused of hiding funds the court ruled in favor of the applicant dissolved the marriage and ordered the defendant to pay nonmaterial damages the court divided the matrimonial property awarded the applicant half of the apartment and ordered the defendant to pay compensation for maintenance the court also determined the costs of the proceedings and the payment of legal fees
